name: One More Hound!
description:
One More Hound! is a hand-draw roguelite game where you'll fight against waves of enemies with unique characteristics, unlock new powers and beat your own records one match after another!
After been teleported by a mysterious creature to this Galatic arena, you will need to fight to survive round after round to see your love-one again!

- Infinite Rounds
- Simple Commands
- Figure out how to defeat your enemies
- Beat your top score rounds in your personal ranking
- Create your best strategy to survive more rounds
- Cute visual
